intro: "Guchio-kun, Year 3, Class G" 3D Puzzle Game is Here!
description:
Guchio's face transforms into various motifs like animals! Connect and merge matching "Guchio pieces" (faces)  to create the biggest, most important entity. Be careful not to let them fall off the plate as you aim for a high score!

Easy to Play
Gameplay is simple: just choose a direction and press a button. When you press the button, A Guchio piece will be thrown onto the plate in that direction.
Connect matching Guchio pieces to merge them and transform them into larger ones! If a piece falls off the plate, it's game over, and your score is recorded. Create large pieces and achieve combos to earn a high score.

Unlock New Motifs as You Play
Achieve goals to unlock new Guchio pieces! Play repeatedly to get all the new ones.

Online Score Ranking
Compete with your recorded scores on the online leaderboards. Challenge players worldwide and aim for the top spot!
